headline: Adobe And Cognizant Expand AI Partnership To Deepen Enterprise Content Role
summary: Adobe and Cognizant announced an expanded global partnership to integrate generative AI into enterprise content, governance, and customer experience workflows. The collaboration focuses on using Adobe's AI-powered platforms with Cognizant's implementation capabilities to scale AI driven content operations for large organizations. The partners are launching a joint go to market approach aimed at helping enterprises manage content demand, brand consistency, and cost pressures. Adobe, traded...
